name: Tennessee Rye Sazerac
preparation:
Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe, discarding any excess, and set aside.
Add remaining ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well-chilled.
Strain into the absinthe-rinsed glass.
Twist a lemon peel over the surface of the glass to express the oils.
Drop the lemon twist into the glass to garnish.
